LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_InitialMessage: As you sit and talk with your friends from {1}, {0} tells you a rumor of a slaver camp near your colony. HECAP says that they have imprisoned HIS sister and ask you to help ambush them and free her.\n\nDo you want to help with this endeavor?
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_InitialMessageRejected: You don't have time for this. {0} is left distraught and leaves crying.
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_SelectPawnsMessage: Select colonists to send to the slaver camp.\nCAUTION: They will be gone for about {0} days!
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_ButtonAssignError: You can't send everyone. Someone needs to watch over the colony!
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_ButtonSendError: Can't send. Noone assigned to go.
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_Message_ReturnedBase: Your team returned from the slaver camp.
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_Message_ReturnedNoTrea: They didn't found any signs of a camp.\nIf it even was there, you are much to late and they have left the area long ago.
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_Message_ReturnedWithTr:
They found the camp, scouted it secretly out and prepared an ambush for the slavers.
After a short fight the slavers where dead or incapacitated.
Carefully asking around they found the sister. It was a tearful reunion.
In a chest they even found something worthwhile to bring back..
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_Message_ReturnedWithEn: But caution, some of the slavers survived and are out for revenge!
LanguageData.RumorOfSlaverCamp_Message_ReturnedWithNe: One of the slaves wanted to join your colony. Please welcome NAME.
